body.name: Hasuit 6 Drawer Double Dresser, 51.5''W Wooden Storage Chest of 6 Drawers, Large Capacity Clothing Storage Cabinet, Wide White Dresser for Bedroom
body.stockDetail: Only 16 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Get Rid of Clutter】：This wood drawer dresser has 6 spacious storage drawers, each with a depth of 14.2", which can store many clothes, toys, books or any other personal items, making your home cleaner! The 51.5 "x15.8" large desktop can be used to display your picture frames, vases and decorations. If you need it, it can also be used as a TV cabinet.

【Perfect Combination of TV Stand and Drawers】：Chest of drawers can be combined with your wall-mounted TV as an entertainment center for your DVDs, record players, and other devices. Hold your entertainment center keep clean and tidy, adds a unique vibe to your leisure time.

【Versatile Drawer Chest】：Large capacity 6 drawer double dresser can be put in any corner of the home to play a role. Store clothes or blankets in the bedroom, organize books and sundries in the living room, place documents in the home office, or use them as a makeup cabinet. This practical and beautiful cabinet is a great gift for family or friends！

【Unique Style and Design】：This black dresser have an elegant and fashionable appearance. The unique design of no handle beveled edge combines the minimalist style with excellent storage capacity. No need to install the handle, which is more convenient and labor-saving. It is easy to match with any indoor style, making your room look clean and bright, and showing your taste.

【Quality Assurance】：The chest of drawer is made of sturdy engineering wood. The high-quality metal slide rail is easy to pull the drawer. Thick back plate and stable base design ensure the stability of the drawer dresser and have a strong bearing capacity. Waterproof and scratch resistant, easy to clean, and equipped with a safe anti-fall device to protect your family.

【Let Us Know】: Our dresser has clear Installation steps, and all parts are individual packed and marked. If you have any problems with assembly and instructions, please contact our store's support team first and we’ll give you a solution. Thank you for your support and trust！

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hasuit Modern Style Long White 6 Drawers Dresser Match the Style of Your Room！ Do you have not enough place to put your clothes, your children's toys, and all kinds of clutter at home? Add a classic, simple storage solution to your room with the Hasuit 6 drawers white dresser. Modern style is easy to match with a variety of bedroom styles, highlighting your taste.

Large-capacity 6 drawers dresser can be put in any corner of the home to play a role. Whether you need to store groceries, baby supplies, or any private items, it will fit perfectly. Chest of drawers can also be used as a dresser TV stand, which is great for displaying DVDs, game controllers, etc.

Wide Desktop and 6 Depth Drawers：Meet Your Storage Needs, Keep Your Home Tidy！ The white long dresser has 2 small and 4 large private storage drawers, the depth of each drawer is 14.6 inches. There is enough space to store clothes, toys, books, or baby supplies. 51.5'' Wide tabletop can place some items within reach.

Advanced Metal Slide System The tested high-quality metal slide rails are quick to install and smooth to pull out, making it easy for you to access items in your daily life. Free Installation Handle The unique no-handle bevel design combines minimalist style with excellent storage capacity. No need to install the handle, more convenient and labor-saving.

Large capacity wide dresser can be put in any corner of the home to play a role. As a bedroom storage cabinet, living room dresser, and hallway porch cabinet. The white drawer dresser for the bedroom is made of solid engineering materials. The thick back plate ensures the stability of the drawer dresser and has a strong bearing capacity. It's a great gift for family or friends！
Color Modern White Material Engineered Wood Net Weight 95lbs Overall Dimensions 51.5"W x 29.2"H x 15.8"D Safety Protection Tipover Restraint Device Included

Quality Comes from Details Metal slide rails make it easy to pull the drawer. The stable base design ensures the stability of the drawer dresser and has a strong bearing capacity. Waterproof and scratch resistant, easy to clean. It is also equipped with a safety fall protection device to protect your family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real wood dresser!
reviews.reviewText: Better quality than expected. I was looking for an inexpensive dresser, and for $130 I honestly expected particle board with a veneer coating. The description said this was a wood dresser, and it really is! I took photos of the pieces so you can see yourself. Every piece of this is actual wood, even the drawers. I mean, it’s not the thickest, highest quality wood, but it’s not particle board.Lots of assembly required, but it’s pretty easy. Took over an hour with two people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Think twice before you buy
reviews.reviewText: I have bought a lot of furniture options from Amazon and they all worked out. I searched high and low and feel I love with this simple dresser. Now, shipping was fast, box weighed 99.2 lbs. all pieces came and the directions. I added wood glue to reinforce things. Material is pressed woods and black satin finished. Very nice quality, some pieces were harder to put in then others, hard to push into place so things can lock into place and every other hole was not all they way drilled. The pegs would not go into the holes easily and then tried to tap into place. To no avail, the pressed wood started crumbling with every turn of a screw. Now the price was too much for the effects that turned into a mess. Now had I not used the would glue, I would have took apart and returned . It was all bad and I would not recommend buying this dresser unless the price drops some under$180. I have a chest of drawers coming and will be returning as soon as I get it. Not work the time or your money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little dresser but make plenty of time to build it
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this dresser for my guest bedroom that I’ve just redecorated from the ground up. The box came with a big tear in it that was covered with tape but nothing inside was damaged.After unpacking it the first thing I thought was “wow, this is going to take a while.” Lots of parts. The instructions are very good though and none of it was particularly difficult to put together, just very time consuming. It took a little under 3 hours to put together, a lot of which was spent hunting for the correct part.The “feet” are basically bits of rubber on spikes that get pushed into the bottom of the dresser. The holes for the spikes on one side of the dresser were too large and they wouldn’t stay in place so I just hammered them in over a little bit from where they should have been. The dresser seems fairly solid and stable although it does move pretty easily over the floor with a light push.The drawers move smoothly although I’m a little wary of how well the bottoms will hold up with any real weight in them. We’ll see over time.It fits a 50” tv perfectly on top of it and it looks pretty attractive. I’m happy with it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put together. Impressed with quality .Perfect for my nursery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice Black dresser it was the perfect size for my daughter room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Drawers are not deep enough and the particle board bottoms are pretty weak and require extra screws for reinforcement. The rest is solidly constructed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is so nice! It took about an an hour and fifteen minutes to assemble. It was easy to assemble for my 65-year-old husband, but would not have been for me. The sturdiness is nice, but the knobs are a little wobbly - even when tightened completely. Value for the money can’t be beat. It’s real wood, and lightweight, rather than compressed wood. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: HORRIBLE purchase!!!!! Not only did it take my very skilled mechanic husband 4 hours to put together, but it’s made out of the cheapest material! It won’t last long that’s for sure… and it’s much smaller then anticipated. I wish I would have returned it before putting it together! Wish I could give less then a star !
